title: Miniature Portrait of Patrick Henry
medium: watercolor on ivory; gold metal frame
provenance_text: Col. Samuel Meredith, Hanover Co., VA; by descent to Samuel Meredith, Jr., his son, Kentucky; by descent to Elizabeth Meredith Johnson, Lexington, KY; purchased by William Macbeth, New York, NY, October 14, 1914; purchased by George S. Palmer, New London, CT, April 15, 1915; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, October 9, 1922; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927.
